description: The C(grove) module sends a message for a service to a Grove.io channel.

service.description: Name of the service (displayed as the "user" in the message)

url.description: Service URL for the web client

channel_token.description: Token of the channel to post to.

validate_certs.description: If C(no), SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.
